description.displayText: Dorothy helped my mom over a year care for my Dad as he had a movement disorder.  She bathed him, fed him, and took him out for walks.  My dog loved Dorothy too, dog always got excited whenever Dorothy came into our home.  I don't know how my mother and I would have done everything without Dorothy.  I would re-hire Dorothy again.  Out of ALL the caretakers we had, Dorothy was the most Compassionate person.  Thank you, Dorothy!
